XenotypeDef.label: varag
XenotypeDef.description: A race of goblinoids capable of high speed movement, they have developed a hardened carapace on top of their heads similar to a natural helmet of sorts to protect them from any high speed impacts which are surprisingly common.
XenotypeDef.descriptionShort: A race of goblinoids capable of high speed movement, they have developed a hardened carapace on top of their heads similar to a natural helmet of sorts to protect them from any high speed impacts which are surprisingly common.
